description.plain:
Nick Miller (a.k.a. ILLENIUM) is an American DJ born in San Francisco. In 2012, he was inspired by a Bassnectar performance at Red Rocks and noted that

when I saw Bassnectar, I got Ableton the next day.

He went on to launch his self-titled debut album in 2013.

After emerging as a then-unknown bedroom producer in 2013, ILLENIUM first broke through on the strength of his early independent releases, including his 2014 self-released Risen and his 2016 debut album, Ashes. His follow-up album, Awake, expanded his vision and cultural impact. Released in September 2017, Awake features the ILLENIUM classics “Crawl Outta Love,” featuring Annika Wells; “Fractures,” featuring Nevve and many more. The album received critical and commercial success.

Where Ashes and Awake formed the ILLENIUM sound, Ascend, released in August 2019 secured his arrival as dance music’s newest crossover king. Serving as both his third full-length album and his major label debut, Ascend was one of the biggest electronic releases of the year, counting +1 billion collective streams and securing a Top 20 hit on the Billboard 200 chart. The album’s lead single “Take You Down” chronicles his past battles with drug addiction and his triumphant recovery.

Onstage, ILLENIUM brings his empowering music to life via his dynamic live show—fully equipped with live keyboards, drum pads and cinematic visuals—that’s seen him dominate the world’s leading festivals, including Coachella, Lollapalooza and many more. as well as his own international solo tours. In 2019, he launched his 42-date Ascend Tour as his most ambitious live excursion to date with sold-out landmark performances at Madison Square Garden and three consecutive nights at the legendary Red Rocks Amphitheatre.

Now as a newly independent artist, ILLENIUM joins 12Tone Music and enters his next creative phase with upcoming music, set for release throughout 2020. It will speak directly to his fans and presents the same much-needed escape he’s delivered over the years.

21 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolFractures Lyrics[Verse 1]

Past our yesterday

See me running full speed at it

Call it post-traumatic
Now it's do-or-die

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsIt’s All on U Lyrics[Verse 1]
At first, I didn't think that I was cut enough to bleed
Then I saw my secrets gettin' swallowed by the sea

[Pre-Chorus]
Through a telescope
I saw a diamond glow
How you brought me home
I guess I'll never know

[Chorus]
With God as my witness, never had it so good
Jumpin' into love, fire sets to dry wood
Started off as nothin', now it's gold
And it's all on you
With God as my witness, never had it so good
Jumpin' into love, fire sets to dry wood
Started off as nothin', now it's gold
And it's all on you
[Post-Chorus]
(Get my kicks from you)
(I get my kicks from you)

[Drop]

[Verse 2]
Can't see, dark road, drivin' up the hills
Lookin' at the girl, hand barely on the wheel

[Pre-Chorus]
Got nowhere to go
We can take it slow
How you brought me home
I guess I'll never know

[Bridge]
Get my kicks from you
I get my kicks from you

[Chorus]
With God as my witness, never had it so good
Jumpin' into love, fire sets to dry wood
Started off as nothin', now it's gold
And it's all on you
You might also like[Drop]
And it's all on you
(And it's all on you)
And it's all on you
(And it's all on you)
And it's all on you

[Outro]
From you
I get my kicks from you8Embed

songs.title: Leaving

description.plain:
Irish singer-songwriter EDEN and American DJ Illenium team up for this single about letting go of past relationships and hardships off of Illenium’s sophomore album Awake.

Originally teased through a final tracklist posted and later deleted by Illenium himself, the song went live on Spotify on 14 September 2017 without announcement.

As with all songs EDEN has been a part of since he switched aliases, aside from his own releases and his features with ATO and Crywolf, he’s officially chosen to go uncredited.

songs.embed_content: Read “Leaving” by ILLENIUM on Genius

Irish singer-songwriter EDEN and American DJ Illenium team up for this single about letting go of past relationships and hardships off of Illenium’s sophomore album Awake.

Originally teased through a final tracklist posted and later deleted by Illenium himself, the song went live on Spotify on 14 September 2017 without announcement.

As with all songs EDEN has been a part of since he switched aliases, aside from his own releases and his features with ATO and Crywolf, he’s officially chosen to go uncredited.

songs.lyrics:
20 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolLeaving Lyrics[Intro]
Hey, just seeing how are you doing
I just wanted to say that I miss you, I guess
And I'm sorry
Call me back
Bye

[Verse 1: EDEN]
So tell me how I'm supposed to feel now
Sixty over the limit just 'cause I can
They say, "You know, you gotta slow down
There's no coming back"
So young and restless, I'm a cliché, yeah
But it's easier said than done
[Pre-Chorus: EDEN]
And I can't keep waiting here
I'm just aging
So I'm gone
Such a shame, and

[Chorus: EDEN]
Baby, I'm leaving
Before tomorrow comes
I don't believe in saying "I'm never coming home"
But I'm drawing the line
And say whatever you like
But I'm leaving
I'm letting go of all I've ever known

[Verse 2: EDEN]
So falling in and falling out fast
I'm burning up, I can't believe this got old so fast
And I'm done with feeling like I'm told I should
'Cause it's a feeling I'm chasing
And I ain't found it here in a while

[Pre-Chorus: EDEN]
But I can't keep waiting here
I'm just aging
So I'm gone
Such a shame, and
You might also like[Chorus: EDEN]
Baby, I'm leaving
Before tomorrow comes
I don't believe in saying "I'm never coming home"
But I'm drawing the line
And say whatever you like
But I'm leaving
I'm letting go of all I've ever known

[Outro: EDEN]
'Cause I'm leaving
'Cause I'm leaving
'Cause I'm leaving
'Cause I'm leaving
'Cause I'm leaving13Embed
